title: the weather channel   tv 10,7, 14 and I Phones  are reporting and showing an area on the map as Murraysville. There is no area off Highway 132 called Murraysville. WE LIVE OFF MURRAYVILLE ROAD---THE MURRAY FAMILY WOULD BE UPSET THAT THE AREA NAME IS INCORRECT. THANKS FOR LOOKING INTO THIS LOCAL CONCERN .
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/05/why-does-my-iphone-call-it-murraysville-everyone-around-here-calls-it-murrayville/
